languages.text: "Что ты такое говоришь, Дитя! Разве этому мы, Великий Регент, учили тебя с самого твоего рождения?"

traits.locale_text: "Что ты такое говоришь, Дитя! Разве этому мы, Великий Регент, учили тебя с самого твоего рождения?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"
languages.original_text: "Что ты такое говоришь, Дитя! Разве этому мы, Великий Регент, учили тебя с самого твоего рождения?"

traits.locale_text: "What are you saying, child! Is this what we, the Great Regent, taught you since the very day of your birth?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "What are you saying, child! Is this what we, the Great Regent, taught you since the very day of your birth?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “你在说什么呢，孩子？从你诞生的那天开始，我们，大摄政王，不就是这么教导你的吗？”
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"

traits.locale_text: “你在说什么呢，孩子？从你诞生的那天开始，我们，大摄政王，不就是这么教导你的吗？”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «¿Qué dices, niña? ¿No es eso lo que yo, el gran regente, llevo enseñándote desde el día en el que naciste?».
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué dices, niña? ¿No es eso lo que yo, el gran regente, llevo enseñándote desde el día en el que naciste?».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「何を言っているのだ、我が子よ。それは我々、大摂政が、お前が生まれたその日から教えてきたことではないか」
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"

traits.locale_text: 「何を言っているのだ、我が子よ。それは我々、大摂政が、お前が生まれたその日から教えてきたことではないか」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Was sagt Ihr da, Kind? Haben wir, der Große Regent, Euch nicht genau das seit Eurer Geburt beigebracht?"
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"

traits.locale_text: "Was sagt Ihr da, Kind? Haben wir, der Große Regent, Euch nicht genau das seit Eurer Geburt beigebracht?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Que dites-vous, Enfant ? C'est pourtant ce que nous, vénérable régent, n'avons cessé de vous dire depuis le jour de votre naissance ! »
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"

traits.locale_text: « Que dites-vous, mon enfant ? C'est pourtant ce que nous, vénérable régent, n'avons cessé de vous dire depuis le jour de votre naissance ! »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Neler söylüyorsun çocuğum? Biz, Yüce Naip olarak doğumundan beri sana öyle olduğunu öğretmedik mi?"
languages.original_text: "What are you saying, child? Isn't that what we, the Great Regent, have taught you since the very day of your birth?"

traits.locale_text: "Neler söylüyorsun çocuğum? Biz, Yüce Naip, doğumundan itibaren sana öyle olduğunu öğretmedik mi?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
